name: automanews.com.br
description: **AutomaNews** is a collaborative content platform focused on **home automation** and **smart home technologies**.   Inspired by [TabNews](https://www.tabnews.com.br/), the project brings together **news, tutorials, reviews, and community discussions** around the world of connected homes.
author: joaohenriquecosta <joaohenrique_costa@icloud.com> (https://automanews.com.br)
